events.title: Eid al-Fitr Celebration
events.description: Annual Eid al-Fitr celebration marking the end of Ramadan.
events.expectations: There will be prayers, food, and community activities. Everyone is welcome!

comments.author: Khalid Hassan
comments.content: Will there be a separate area for families?

comments.author: Hassan Nabil
comments.content: Are there any volunteer opportunities for setup?

comments.author: Omar Youssef
comments.content: What kind of traditional food will be served?

comments.author: Ali Salem
comments.content: Will there be activities for children?

events.title: Eid al-Adha Celebration
events.description: Annual celebration of Eid al-Adha with community gathering and activities.
events.expectations: Traditional foods, prayers, and family activities will be available.

events.title: Final Exam Review Session
events.description: Comprehensive review session covering all topics for the upcoming final exam.
events.expectations: Bring your textbooks, notes, and questions. We'll cover key concepts and practice problems.

comments.author: Sami Ahmed
comments.content: Will this session be recorded for later viewing?

events.title: Bahrain National Day
events.description: Celebrate Bahrain's National Day with music, fireworks, and cultural performances.
events.expectations: Dress festively in red and white. Seating is on a first-come, first-served basis.

comments.author: Zaid Fadel
comments.content: Will there be shuttle buses from campus?

comments.author: Ali Kareem
comments.content: Can we bring small flags or banners?

events.title: Career Fair
events.description: Meet representatives from top companies looking to hire graduates.
events.expectations: Bring multiple copies of your resume and dress professionally.

comments.author: Tariq Sami
comments.content: Is there a map of the event layout?

comments.author: Nabil Fawzi
comments.content: Can we submit resumes online in advance?

events.title: Research Symposium
events.description: Annual showcase of student and faculty research projects.
